DPRK Delegation Leaves for Seoul
   Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Measure Committee for Demanding Compensation to Comfort Women for the Japanese Army and the Victims of Forcible Drafting led by Chairwoman Hong Son Ok left here Thursday to take part in the 8th Asian Solidarity Meeting for the Settlement of the Issue of "Comfort Women" for the Japanese Army to be held in Seoul.
